title: Introducing_emailjsr
text: package use emailjs.com service easily.

title: Introducing_emailjsr
text: use, sign emailjs.com, make template. Please sure expose user id, access token, .

title: Introducing_emailjsr
text: allow EmailJS API non-browser applications.

title: Introducing_emailjsr
text: want detect User-agent, Browser width height, type shinybrowser::detect() ui.

title: Introducing_emailjsr
text: use ‘shiny’, can use preset modal. Please remember fill ids, tokens. can see button named “Show feedback modal”. message default, can change . click, see modal .  preset, Feedback * required. don’t write anything, error message shown. fill Feedback * form(needed), just click “Submit” button. receive email right away.
code: library(shiny) library(emailjsr)  ui <- fluidPage(   use_emailjsr_ui("id") )  server <- function(input, output, session) {   emailjsr::use_emailjsr_server("id",     service_id = "Your_service_id",     template_id = "Your_template_id",     user_id = "Your_user_id",     access_token = "Your_Access_Token",     language = "en"   ) }  shinyApp(ui, server)

title: Introducing_emailjsr
text: can make issue github repository. bug report, suggestion welcomed.

code: library(shiny) library(emailjsr)  ui <- fluidPage(   use_emailjsr_ui("id") )  server <- function(input, output, session) {   emailjsr::use_emailjsr_server("id",     service_id = "Your_service_id",     template_id = "Your_template_id",     user_id = "Your_user_id",     access_token = "Your_Access_Token",     language = "en"   ) }  shinyApp(ui, server)

title: send_email — send_email
text: Send email using emailjs service.

title: send_email — send_email
code: send_email(   service_id,   user_id,   template_id,   template_params = list(),   access_token = NULL )

title: send_email — send_email
text: service_id emailjs.com Service Id user_id emailjs.com User Id Public Key template_id emailjs.com Template Id template_params Params passed emailjs.com. set template emailjs.com prior. access_token emailjs.com Access Token Private Key. Default NULL case use access token.

title: send_email — send_email
text: allow EmailJS API non-browser applications.

title: send_email — send_email
code: library(emailjsr)  send_email("service_id", "user_id", "template_id", "access_token", list(name = "John Doe")) #> Response [https://api.emailjs.com/api/v1.0/email/send] #>   Date: 2022-11-13 15:10 #>   Status: 400 #>   Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 #>   Size: 94 B #>

title: use_emailjsr_ui — use_emailjsr_ui
text: emailjs.com R support preset modal

title: use_emailjsr_ui — use_emailjsr_ui
text: id id use_emailjsr_server. message Messege button.

title: use_emailjsr_ui — use_emailjsr_ui
code: library(shiny) library(emailjsr) ui <- fluidPage(   use_emailjsr_ui("id") )  server <- function(input, output, session) {   emailjsr::use_emailjsr_server("id",     service_id = "Your_service_id",     template_id = "Your_template_id", user_id = "Your_user_id",     access_token = "Your_Access_Token"   ) }

title: use_emailjsr_server — use_emailjsr_server
text: emailjs.com R support preset modal

title: use_emailjsr_server — use_emailjsr_server
code: use_emailjsr_server(   id,   service_id,   user_id,   template_id,   access_token,   language = "en" )

title: use_emailjsr_server — use_emailjsr_server
text: id id use_emailjsr_ui service_id emailjs.com Service Id user_id emailjs.com User Id template_id emailjs.com Template Id access_token emailjs.com Access Token language Language modal. "en" English, "ko" Korean.

title: use_emailjsr_server — use_emailjsr_server
code: library(shiny) library(emailjsr) ui <- fluidPage(   use_emailjsr_ui("id") )  server <- function(input, output, session) {   emailjsr::use_emailjsr_server("id",     service_id = "Your_service_id",     template_id = "Your_template_id",     user_id = "Your_user_id",     access_token = "Your_Access_Token",     language = "en"   ) }
